						$(window).load(function(){

								/**
								 * Determine the mobile operating system.
								 * This function returns one of 'iOS', 'Android', 'Windows Phone', or 'unknown'.
								 *
								 * @returns {String}
								 */
								function getMobileOperatingSystem() {
								  var userAgent = navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera;

								      // Windows Phone must come first because its UA also contains "Android"
								    if (/windows phone/i.test(userAgent)) {
								        return "Windows Phone";
								    }

								    if (/android/i.test(userAgent)) {
								        return "Android";
								    }

								    // iOS detection from: http://stackoverflow.com/a/9039885/177710
								    if (/iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test(userAgent) && !window.MSStream) {
								        return "iOS";
								    }

								    return false;
								}


						   function explode(){
								  $('.largeLabel').parent().addClass('dParent');
								}

							if(getMobileOperatingSystem()){
						   window.setTimeout(explode, 3000);
							}
						})

        $(document).ready(function() {
            //open close faqs
            $('div.faq-list div.answer').hide();
            $('div.faq-list .question').bind('click',function(){
                var question = $(this);
                if(question.parent().hasClass('on')){
                    question.next().slideUp('fast');
                    question.parent().removeClass('on')
                }else{
                    $('div.faq-list div.answer').slideUp('fast');
                    $('div.faq-list li.item').removeClass('on');
                    question.next().slideDown('fast');
                    question.parent().addClass('on')
                }
                return false;
            });
        });

            "LT","LV","LY","MA","MG","MN","MT","MU","MX","MY","NG","PE","PH",
            "PK","PL","PS","PT","PY","QA","RO","RS","ME","RU","SA","SD","SG",
            "SK","SY","TH","TN","TR","TW","UA","US","CA","UY","VE","VN","YE",
            "TT","HN","CR","DO","BB","PR","BI","DJ","ER","ET","KE","SS","RW",
            "SO","TZ","UG","AZ","BY","KZ","KG","MD","AM","GE","TJ","UZ","TM",
            "DK","NO","SE","AL","MK","SI","AO","BF","BJ","CG","CF","CI","CM",
            "CV","GA","GM","GN","GQ","GW","LR","ML","MR","NE","SL","SN","ST",
            "TD","TG","BW","LS","NW","MZ","NA","ZA","SZ","ZM","ZE","SI","CO","KP","KR"];

var AE_countries = ["AE","BH","OM"];
var AU_countries = ["AU","NZ"];
var BE_countries = ["BE","LU","NL"];
var CC_countries = ["TT","HN","CR","DO","BB","PR"];
var EA_countries = ["BI","DJ","ER","ET","KE","SS","RW","SO","TZ","UG"];
var KZ_countries = ["AZ","BY","KZ","KG","MD","AM","GE","TJ","UZ","TM"];
var NA_countries = ["US","CA"];
var SE_countries = ["DK","NO","SE"];
var SI_countries = ["AL","MK","SI"];
var SN_countries = ["AO","BF","BJ","CG","CF","CI","CM","CV","GA","GM","GN","GQ","GW","LR","ML","MR","NE","SL","SN","ST","TD","TG"];
var RS_countries = ["RS","ME"];
var ZA_countries = ["BW","LS","NW","MZ","NA","ZA","SZ","ZM","ZE"];

$(document).ready(function(){
	//Get user's location and site from either AKAMAI or APACHE configuration
	// users will be directed to corporate url if he/she typed www.amadeus.com
	var visitorsLocation=getUserCountry(); 
	var userPreferenceCookie = getCookie("userPreference");
	var isCorporateURL = true;
	var showCookiesLightbox = true;
	//If site is corporate
	if(isCorporateURL){
		//If visitor has location continue,
		//If not location available check if is needed to show default cookie box
		if(visitorsLocation){
			if(!userPreferenceCookie){
				//Check if site available for user location
				var siteAvailable = isSiteAvailable(visitorsLocation);
				console.log(siteAvailable);
				if(siteAvailable){
				
					//Load local module for detected location and all other functions
					 $.ajax({
				      	url: '/web/amadeus',
			               data: { 
			                   pagename : 'CentralSite/Common/Presentation/AMAD_CookieManagementModule',
			                   cookiePolicyId : '1319607040997',
			                   homePageId : '1319560218660',
			                   site : visitorsLocation
			               }, 
				      	success: function(data) {
				      		//Load data
				      		$("#localModule").html(data);
				      		init_fancybox();
				      		setACORedirect();
				      		
				    		//Show module
				    		$("#wrapper").prepend($(".country-lightbox.country-region"));
				    		$(".country-lightbox.country-region").css("display","block");
			
				    		showCookiesLightbox = false;
				      	},
				      	error: function(){
				      		//If error we log an error in the navigator console
							console.log("Error on ajax call");
				    	}
				    });
					
				}else{
					//No site available for location
		    		$("#wrapper").prepend($(".country-lightbox.no-specific"));
		    		$(".country-lightbox.no-specific").css("display","block");
		    		
		    		showCookiesLightbox = false;
				}
			}
		} else{
			//Show cookies lightbox if not location founded
			if(!getCookie("cookies_acepted")){
				showDefaultCookiesLightBox();
				
				//Cookies accepted for navigate on site
				setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
			}
		}
	}else{	
		//Show cookies lightbox for ACO if not done before
		if(!getCookie("cookies_acepted")){
			showDefaultCookiesLightBox();
			
			//Cookies accepted for navigate on site
			setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
		}
	}
		
	//Close button
	$(".close").click(function(){
		$(".country-lightbox").hide();
		
		//Cookies accepted for navigate on site
		setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
		
		//No preference
		region_preferences = "";
		setCookie("userPreference", "corporate");
	});
	
	
	//Stay in global site (Region or country specific)
	$("#globalSite").click(function(e){
		if(e.preventDefault) e.preventDefault();
		if($("#globalCheckBox").prop('checked')){
			region_preferences = "remember";
			setCookie("userPreference", "corporate" ,365);
			utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences});
		}else{
			region_preferences = "not remember";
			setCookie("userPreference", "corporate");
			utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences +";exp-session"});
		}
		setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
		$(".country-lightbox").hide();
	});		
	
	//Stay in global site (No region or country specific)
	$("#globalSiteNoSpecific").click(function(e){
		if(e.preventDefault) e.preventDefault();
		if($("#globalCheckBoxNoSpecific").prop('checked')){
			region_preferences = "remember";
			setCookie("userPreference", "corporate" ,365);
			utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences});
		}else{
			region_preferences = "not remember";
			setCookie("userPreference", "corporate");
			utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences +";exp-session"});
		}
		setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
		$(".country-lightbox").hide();
	});	
	
	//Go to ACO site
	function setACORedirect(){
		$("#acolSite").click(function(e){

			//if(e.preventDefault) e.preventDefault();
			if($("#countryRegionCheckBoxGlobal").prop('checked')){
				region_preferences = "remember";
				setCookie("userPreference", $(this).attr('data-site') ,365);
				utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences});
			}else{
				region_preferences = "not remember";
				setCookie("userPreference", $(this).attr('data-site'));				
				utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences +";exp-session"});
			}
			setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
			$(".country-lightbox").hide();
		});
	} 
});

//Check if site available for user location
function isSiteAvailable(visitorsLocation){
	return regions.indexOf(visitorsLocation)>=0 || countryRegions.indexOf(visitorsLocation)>=0;
}

//Get User location country
function getUserCountry(){
	
		//Country cod
		var country='';
		//Call to get X-Akamai-Edgescape
		//var responseHeader = xhr.getResponseHeader("1A-CountryCode");
		debugger;
		$.ajax({
			url: '/healthcheck.html',//healthcheck.html or geocheck.html
			async: false,
			success: function(data, status, xhr) {
				var responseHeader = xhr.getResponseHeader("1A-CountryCode");
				if(responseHeader){
					country = responseHeader.split('=')[1];
					
					//Get region code if available
					country = checkCountryRegion(country);
				}
				
			},
			error: function(){
				//If error we log an error in the navigator console
				console.log("Error on ajax call");
			}
		});
		
		//Return country cod
		console.log("Country code: " + country);
		return country;
	
}

//If country code is in one region we return region code,
//if not we return the seme country code
function checkCountryRegion(country){
	change_region = "only global site";
	if(AE_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'AE';}
	if(AU_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'AU';}
	if(BE_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'BE';}
	if(CC_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'CC';}
	if(EA_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'EA';}
	if(KZ_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'KZ';}
	if(NA_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'US';}
	if(SE_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'SE';}
	if(SI_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'SI';}
	if(SN_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'SN';}
	if(RS_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'RS';}
	if(ZA_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'ZA';}
	if(countryRegions.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "local site";}
	
	utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;
	
	return country;
}

//Show default cookie box
function showDefaultCookiesLightBox(){
	$("#wrapper").prepend($(".country-lightbox.cookies"));
	$(".country-lightbox.cookies").css("display","block");
}
</script>

	<div>
		<a class="fancybox omnitureInternalPromotion" filetitle="Amadeus vision for a Global Travel Ecosystem" href="/web/amadeus/en_1A-corporate/Amadeus-Home/Travel-trends/Travel-industry-trends/130-by-2020/380x331_Infoghraphic/1319608138884-Page-AMAD_Detail_PopUp_Ppal?assetid=1319608450522&assettype=BannerImage_C"><img align="right" alt="Amadeus vision for a Global Travel Ecosystem" height="165" src="http://www.amadeus.com/images/130by2020/200x165_Amadeus-vision-for-a-Global-Travel-Ecosystem.png" width="200" /></a></div>
	<p>
		Our vision is to power an open, intelligent, dynamic and customer-centric global travel ecosystem that seamlessly connects airlines, travel sellers, airports, hotels and all other participants in the travel industry. All players will be able to share information in real-time and across all touch-points of the travel lifecycle, creating a single view of the traveller.</p>
	<div style="float: left">
		<a class="omnitureDocument" filetitle="The evolution of airline merchandising" href="http://www.amadeus.com/images/130by2020/The_evolution_of_airline_merchandising.pdf" target="_blank" title="The evolution of airline merchandising"><img align="left" alt="The evolution of airline merchandising" height="246" src="http://www.amadeus.com/images/130by2020/180x246_The_evolution_of_airline_merchandising.png" width="180" /></a></div>
	<p>
		Leveraging the customer insight generated by the <strong class="strongMain">global travel ecosystem</strong>, our technology enables precise merchandising and retailing to deliver a truly personalised and dynamic shopping experience. This means airlines can unlock more than <strong class="strongMain">US$130 billion in additional revenues by 2020</strong>.</p>
	<p>Amadeus Global Merchandising is about reaching travellers anywhere (regardless of the sales channel used), any time (throughout the 'pre-trip to on-trip' journey cycle) and adapting the merchandising strategy to anyone (based on traveller context, behaviour and value).   Providing the right product, through the right channel, at the right time will ensure that airlines can strive for service excellence and generate incremental revenues from expanding shopping baskets.</p>
	<p>
		We believe that our combination of assets and resources means Amadeus is uniquely placed to deliver this vision, which is guiding our investments in all areas of the global travel ecosystem.</p>
</div>

<p class="scrollMenu3">
	“The global travel industry, and the way in which consumers experience it, is changing so dramatically that it requires a fundamental change to the way in which travel is sold and how the traveller is served”<br />
	<span style="font-weight: bold">Luis Maroto, Chief Executive Officer and President of Amadeus.</span></p>
<br />
<br />

<div>
	<p>
		Our vision is underpinned by the development of the new <strong class="strongSecondary"><a class="Secondary" href="/web/amadeus/en_1A-corporate/Amadeus-Home/Travel-trends/Travel-industry-trends/130-by-2020/Amadeus-Global-Merchandising-System/1319608218104-Page-AMAD_DetailAdvancedPpal" tilte="Amadeus Global Merchandising System">Amadeus Global Merchandising System</a></strong> and the evolution of the <strong class="strongSecondary"><a class="Secondary" href="/web/amadeus/en_1A-corporate/Amadeus-Home/Travel-trends/Travel-industry-trends/130-by-2020/Amadeus-Global-Retailing-and-Distributions-Systems-Direct-Channel/1319608385660-Page-AMAD_DetailAdvancedPpal" tilte="Amadeus Global Retailing and Distribution Systems">Amadeus Global Retailing and Distribution Systems</a></strong>. Fully integrated across the <strong class="strongSecondary">Amadeus Airline Core Systems</strong> and using real-time customer data, airlines can access a single customer view to deliver the best end-to-end traveller experience while identifying and fulfilling new sales opportunities.</p>

Download the report See all reports Investor relations Customer area Make this page my default Amadeus page LinkedIn Amadeus Home Travel trends Travel industry trends 130 by 2020 Unlocking new airline revenues with the global travel ecosystem Our vision is to power an open, intelligent, dynamic and customer-centric global travel ecosystem that seamlessly connects airlines, travel sellers, airports, hotels and all other participants in the travel industry. All players will be able to share information in real-time and across all touch-points of the travel lifecycle, creating a single view of the traveller. Leveraging the customer insight generated by the global travel ecosystem , our technology enables precise merchandising and retailing to deliver a truly personalised and dynamic shopping experience. This means airlines can unlock more than US$130 billion in additional revenues by 2020 . Amadeus Global Merchandising is about reaching travellers anywhere (regardless of the sales channel used), any time (throughout the 'pre-trip to on-trip' journey cycle) and adapting the merchandising strategy to anyone (based on traveller context, behaviour and value). Providing the right product, through the right channel, at the right time will ensure that airlines can strive for service excellence and generate incremental revenues from expanding shopping baskets. We believe that our combination of assets and resources means Amadeus is uniquely placed to deliver this vision, which is guiding our investments in all areas of the global travel ecosystem. “The global travel industry, and the way in which consumers experience it, is changing so dramatically that it requires a fundamental change to the way in which travel is sold and how the traveller is served” Luis Maroto, Chief Executive Officer and President of Amadeus. The global travel ecosystem Our vision is underpinned by the development of the new Amadeus Global Merchandising System and the evolution of the Amadeus Global Retailing and Distribution Systems . Fully integrated across the Amadeus Airline Core Systems and using real-time customer data, airlines can access a single customer view to deliver the best end-to-end traveller experience while identifying and fulfilling new sales opportunities.
